General.Name: Reitmans (Canada) Limited
General.Description: Reitmans (Canada) Limited primarily engages in the retail sale of women's wear apparel in Canada. The company's products include shirts, blouses, pants, dresses, skirts, sweaters, outerwear, activewear, lingerie, footwear, and accessories. It also offers apparel for men. The company serves customers through retail and e-commerce channels. As of May 19, 2020, it operated 576 stores, including 259 Reitmans, 106 Penningtons, 80 RW & CO., 77 Addition Elle, and 54 Thyme Maternity stores. The company was founded in 1926 and is based in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 250 Sauve Street West, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3L 1Z2
